contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.description: We are here to assist you with all your appliance maintenance needs. Contact us for reliable and professional service.

home.title: Having trouble with your appliance?
home.description: At Appliance Care, we specialize in high-quality appliance maintenance and repair. Our certified technicians resolve any issues so your appliances work like new.
home.brandsTitle: Some of the brands we service include

dashboard.welcomeMessage: Welcome, {{ userName }} {{ userLastName }} to Appliance Care!
dashboard.description: We are glad to have you back. Explore our appliance maintenance and repair services and find the perfect solution for your needs.

registration.title: Appliance Registration
registration.description: Register your appliances to receive specialized technical support. Keep an organized record and easily access your equipment information.

tracking.title: Product Tracking
tracking.description: Check your registered products and their history. Verify the delivery time of your new products and keep track of your appliances.

payments.title: Payment Management
payments.description: Manage your payments quickly and securely. View your payment history and make new payments for your appliance repair and maintenance services.

formProduct.CONTACT_US_DESCRIPTION: We want to hear from you. Please fill out the form below, and we will get in touch as soon as possible.
formProduct.FIRST_NAME_MINLENGTH: First name must be at least 2 characters long.
formProduct.FIRST_NAME_MAXLENGTH: First name cannot be more than 50 characters long.
formProduct.LAST_NAME_MINLENGTH: Last name must be at least 2 characters long.
formProduct.LAST_NAME_MAXLENGTH: Last name cannot be more than 50 characters long.
formProduct.SERVICE_REQUEST_DESCRIPTION: Please provide the details of the requested service.
formProduct.APPLIANCE_IMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Upload an image of the damaged appliance.
formProduct.IMAGE_REQUIRED: Image of the damaged appliance is required.
formProduct.PROBLEM_DETAILS_PLACEHOLDER: Describe the problem with the appliance
